resources.string: I am the architect of my life. I am the one who builds the foundation and chooses its contents.
I forgive those who have harmed me in the past and peacefully break away from them.
My ability to conquer challenges is limitless. My potential for success is infinite.
Today, I abandoned my old habits and replaced them with new ones, which are more positive just for you.
Thank you for fighting for your life for yourself.
Good things are always coming into my life.
New opportunities await me at every turn.
My body is healthy. My mind is brilliant. My soul is calm
Things will unfold at precisely the right time.
Whatever happens now, is happening for my ultimate good.
